description:
go/build: remove 'go/build' from error messages

This leads to really confusing messages in goinstall.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7415950ef2a4 ***

go/build: remove 'go/build' from error messages

This leads to really confusing messages in goinstall.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5495074

subject: code review 5495074: go/build: remove 'go/build' from error messages
